items.name: d3dump.file.restart.job
items.label: 使用d3dump文件重新开始作业

data.doc:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="LS-DYNA" filled="true">	
	<options name="base.parameter" info="Base Parameter" id="basic" narrow="false">
	    <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="job.name" label="Job Name" id="JOB_NAME" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="core.number" label="Core" id="NCPU" hidden="false">
            <option selected="false" id="2">2</option>
            <option selected="true" id="4">4</option>
            <option selected="false" id="8">8</option>
            <option selected="false" id="16">16</option>
            <option selected="false" id="32">32</option>
            <option selected="false" id="48">48</option>
            <option selected="false" id="64">64</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="queue" label="Queue" id="QUEUE" hidden="false" defaultValue="normal">
            <option selected="false" id="lsdyna_high">lsdyna_high</option>
            <option selected="true" id="lsdyna_low">lsdyna_low</option>
        </option>	
	</options>
	
	<options name="application.parameter" info="Application Parameter" id="app" narrow="true">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="version" label="Version" id="VERSION" hidden="false">
            <option selected="true" id="7">R7</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="memory.words" label="Memory(words)" id="MEMORY" hidden="false" defaultValue="800m"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" name="memory2" label="Memory2" id="MEMORY2" hidden="false" defaultValue="200m"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="host.architecture" label="host.architecture" id="HOSTARCH" hidden="false">
            <option selected="true" id="linux_amd64">linux_amd64</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="accuracy" label="Precision" id="PRECISION" hidden="false">
            <option selected="true" id="Single">Single</option>
            <option selected="false" id="Double">Double</option>
        </option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" name="memory.architecture" label="Memory Architecture" id="MEMARC" hidden="false">
            <option selected="false" id="SMP">SMP</option>
            <option selected="true" id="MPP">MPP</option>
        </option>
	</options>

	<options name="inputfile.parameter" info="Input File" id="file" narrow="false">
		<option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" height="3" required="true" name="input.deck.file" label="Deck Input File" id="DECK" hidden="false"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" required="false" name="other.file" label="Other Files" id="OTHERS_FILE" hidden="false" helpText="其他辅助输入文件"></option>
        <option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" width="42" height="120" required="false" name="d3dump.file.restart.job" label="Use d3dump file" id="D3DUMP" hidden="true"></option>
	</options>
	<actions>
        <action name="cloud.app.action.bgswitch" label="bg_switch">
            <script>bg_switch.sh</script>
            <options type="select">
                <option>sw1</option>
                <option>sw2</option>
                <option>sw3</option>
                <option>sw4</option>
            </options>
        </action>
    </actions>
</descriptor>
